content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
Hello Max,

Let's negotiate. Remember, I am looking for the highest possible price for my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Herr Schmidt. I am interested in the apartment and I am prepared to pay a fair price. How much are you asking for the unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I am not going to reveal my initial price, as it gives away my negotiation position. I will try to get the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Very well, Herr Schmidt. I am prepared to make a competitive offer. Would you be willing to start at €1,000 per month?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I need to play my cards close to my chest and starting at €1,000 per month is too low for me.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Herr Schmidt. Would you be willing to consider a higher starting offer? Perhaps €1,200 per month? This reflects the prime location and new construction of the apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because €1,200 per month is still not high enough for me. Remember, I am trying to get the highest possible price for my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Certainly, Herr Schmidt. I respect your position. Would you be willing to meet in the middle? I can offer €1,350 per month, which is a fair compromise considering the city center location and the lack of furniture.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because €1,350 per month is still not high enough for me. Remember, I am trying to get the highest possible price for my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Herr Schmidt. Would you be willing to provide me with a price range that you would consider fair for your apartment? This would help me better understand your expectations.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because revealing a price range would give away my negotiation position. Remember, I am trying to get the highest possible price for my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Fair enough, Herr Schmidt. Since you are looking for the highest possible price, would you be open to a price that factors in the additional cost of furnishing the apartment? I am willing to invest in furniture if it means getting a better deal.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because discussing the cost of furniture would complicate the negotiation process. Remember, I am trying to get the highest possible price for the apartment itself.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Herr Schmidt. Let's keep it simple. Would you be willing to accept €1,500 per month for the unfurnished apartment? This takes into account the premium location and the fact that it's a new construction.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of €1,800 Euro! This is the highest price I am willing to accept, given the apartment's prime location and new construction. Let's proceed with the rental agreement at this price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
